price: E submete-vos o que há nos céus e o que há na terra: tudo é dEle. Por certo, há nisso sinais para um povo que reflete.
arabic: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا مِّنۡهُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wasakhara lakum mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi jamīʿan min'hu inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yatafakkarūna
